description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Reports to: 	Sales Manager
              
              - Core Products: 	Facility cleaning & maintenance, floor safety, anti-slip tapes & treads, etc.
              

              Link to the products:
              
              http://www.3m.com/3M/en_US/commercial-solutions-us/
              

              ***Work Location:
              

              3M Hanoi Office, 15th Floor, GELEX Building, 52 Le Dai Hanh, Hai Ba Trung District, Hanoi
              

              ***Job Expectations
              

              •	Be responsible for Sales objectives /Sales Plan for the assigned area  by developing key Direct accounts and also maintain good contacts & relationship with strategic accounts of the distributors in Hanoi
              
              •	Develop & Implement Strategies and action plans in coordination with the Line Manager to meet the division objectives.
              
              •	Work independently & jointly with the Distributor team to meet set objectives
              
              •	Identify new Customer  in market segment
              
              •	Work towards selling High margin products to increase profitability.
              
              •	Work closely with Technical Service Dept to provide necessary services, advices, training…for customers
              
              •	Liaise closely with Distributors for proper sales forecasting and follow up on orders to follow the Sales Plan.
              
              •	Have good Market Intelligence to follow Competitor actions
              
              •	Work close with marketer  in executing marketing activities in assigned area
              
              •	Provide Product training & support to Distributor Sales Rep’s & Distributor team.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Vietnamese nationality with local market insights
              
              - University graduate, experience in HORECA segment or facility management is preferable
              
              - 4-6 years of Sales and distributor management experience
              
              - Good English and Vietnamese communication
              
              - Excellent Interpersonal and communication skills
              
              - Result-oriented and proactive manner
              

              ***About 3M
              

              3M captures the spark of new ideas and transforms them into thousands of ingenious products. Our culture of creative collaboration inspires a never-ending stream of powerful technologies that make life better. 3M is the innovation company that never stops inventing. With $30 billion in sales, 3M employs about 88,000 people worldwide and has operations in more than 70 countries. Be part of what's next. Join 3M - follow us 3MCareers and learn more at YouTube.com/3MCareers.
